version_description:
1. Fixed a bug that causes "You have an unfinished game" dialog to be popped-up incorrectly.
2. Fix some other bugs.

- Fixed winning streak losing problem caused by the opponent network.

- Fixed some adverse effects of online lobby connections and multiplayer games.

- Fixed some display defects on the user interface.

1. AI improved

2. Tournaments become best of three games

3. Fixed some bugs

1. Modify the address of online lobby server. The old versions will not be able to enter the Online Lobby in the near future. We recommend that all users upgrade to this version.
2. Fixed some bugs.

1.Fixed a bug: The game crashes on iPhone 6 Plus when zoomed display mode is on.
2.Fixed some other bugs.

1. A "New" icon will show when a new incentive video is available. It makes players to earn FREE coins more easily.
2. Fixed some bugs.

1. Fully supports 64 - bit systems.
2. In iOS7 and above systems, use multi peer connectivity to implement the local multiplayer mode instead of bluetooth. Now there are three local connection modes can be chosen: LAN/Wifi-Direct/Bluetooth. And the connection stability is also improved.
3. Fixed a bug: Can not post to Facebook.

1. Support iOS9.
2. Fixed some other bugs.
Fixed some bugs that cause social networks to work incorrectly.

1.Remove the close button on the right upper conner of the banner ads.
2.Fix some other bugs.
1. Fix something in order to comply with AdMob program policies.

1. Support IPv6 only network.
2. Update some third party SDKs.
3. Fix bug: The message "You have an unfinished game" may appear incorrectly sometimes, causing win streak fail.
4. Fix some other bugs.
1.Fix bug: The items you bought may be lost in iOS10 sometimes when you do not sign in with a Game Center account.

1. Fix bug: The pause button in game can not be pushed when 3D touch is enabled.
2. Update some third-party SDKs.
3. Fix some other bugs.

1. Fix bugs: Sometimes coins will not be rewarded after watching videos on iOS10.
2. Fix some other bugs.

1. Put some connecting tasks to the background to reduce the waiting time into the lobby.
2. Fix some bugs.

1. Now players won't change their order in the lobby, so that you can challenge an opponent more easily.
2. Fix some bugs.

1. Fixed a bug that can be used to cheat.
2. Provide a more adequate mechanism for energy supply.

1. Adapt iOS11.
2.Fixed some other bugs.
Fixed a bug: In some cases you will not get coins after watching a rewarded video.

- Add new racket Properties "Loop Drive", brings both play with spin and ball speed.

- Launched a brand new global super league.

- The new league brings new points system and global real-time leaderboards.

- More stringent verification of the results of the game, to prevent escape and cheating.

- Added the Club concept and it is free to create and join.

- Added chat and communication methods within the new Club.

- Improved lobby matching, now supporting international connections and taking into account player level and network speed screening.

- New challenge mode, bonuses and prizes.

- Improved stability and efficiency.

- A new interface in the online lobby.

• Fixed the crash when joining in the Challenge.

• Fixed "unfinished match" issues under certain conditions.

• Fixed some service bugs.

• Racket balance adjustment:
    - Reduced "Thunder" loop effect.
    - Added the “Tornado” loop effect.
    - Added "Storm" stability and increased loop effect.

• All paddles are more easier to stroke.

• Improve the stability and efficiency of the online lobby.

• Support iPhone X perfectly.

• The captain can quit from the club.

• Display FPS

• New Promotions added

• Fixed display priority issue for "Preparing the game..."

• Balance adjustment
     - "Storm" requires a Speed Rubber to support the Loop Drive, and the ball speed of the paddle is slightly improved.
     - "Thunder" needs Long Pimples Rubber to support the Loop Drive
Fixed some bugs and improved stability.
1. A little league rule adjustment.
Support iPhone XS and iPhone XS Max.
Adapt to iOS13
1. UI adjustment

- The difference required for a friendly match is dynamically adjusted based on the player's current medal.
- The club can easily view the applicant's information when receiving the application.
- Add two game scenes.
- Some optimizations and improvements in performance, stability, and Ai performance.
Fixed an issue where the bar scene was not displayed correctly on the iPhone XR.
Fixed a crash bug on iOS 8 and iOS 9.
- Enhanced network verification for online matches

- Fixed a bug where sometimes the ball stopped on the ground and could not serve.
- When the serve player let three times in a row will change service.
- Adjust the safety and angle of the safe return ball (lob).
- Fixed a bug that sometimes hits the net ball abnormally.

- Add a new racket "Blizzard"
- Improved the aggressiveness and tactical behavior of AI opponents
- Fixed a "missing" problem that sometimes occurred on hitting the ball
- Enhanced network detection for online matches
- Enhanced network verification for online matches

- The difference required for a friendly match is dynamically adjusted based on the player's current medal.
- The club can easily view the applicant's information when receiving the application.
- Add two game scenes.
- Some optimizations and improvements in performance, stability, and Ai performance.
Fixed an issue where the bar scene was not displayed correctly on the iPhone XR.
- Fixed a problem with the racket lag in the match and improved the frame rate of the game.
Fixed a crash bug on iOS 8 and iOS 9.
Fixed a match result judgment error due to the opponent disconnected.
1. UI adjustment
Adapt to iOS13
A bug that use network delays to win online matches has been fixed.
Improved network verification judgment of online game
Change the online lobby search behavior back to the previous version.
Multi-account login adds a time limit to avoid the transfer of medals in online matches.
Improved history recording of the online game.
Fixed some minor issues.
Adapt to iOS 14 and iPhone 12 series.

1. Fixed the problem that the local multiplayer game cannot find the opponent.
2. Fixed the problem of not being able to play online through GameCenter.
3. Fixed the problem of repeatedly displaying the unlock achievement dialog.
